location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Elphinstone, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government dated 26 March 1811, which informed the Resident that Government had passed all his accounts from July to November 1810, with the exception of a charge for interest which he is ordered to re-credit to the Company. It is explained that this charge was incurred while William Bruce was absent from the Residency.
